footer.aboutMeText1: I am a Full Stack Developer and IT Solution Architect with over 10 years of expertise in developing comprehensive software solutions and microservice architectures. My focus lies on scalable cloud solutions, where clean code and sustainable engineering are not just buzzwords but a lived practice. With my architectural experience and strong communication skills, I efficiently distill complex requirements— from conception to implementation.
footer.responseTime: Emails are answered within 1-2 business days.
footer.contactPhone: For telephone contact, please arrange in advance via email.
